name: Cooking Momo: The Wholesome Momo Challenge
name_original: Cooking Momo: The Wholesome Momo Challenge
description:
Hi guys! In light of the Momo challenge that has been surfacing on the Internets, I decided to conquer my fear of Momo by creating a horrendesly wholesome rendition of Momo in...Cooking Momo. Learn important kitchen safety tips from Momo as you cut...tomatoes. This is a really silly game I whipped up and please don't take it too seriously! I hope that you guys keep positive in these days and make sure to love yourself! 

Gameplay: Click the knife to cut! 

Let me know any records, bugs, and glitches! 
RECORD: [could be you!]
